Key Match Events: Jaren Jackson Jr. scored 38 points and grabbed 10 rebounds.
Desmond Bane added 31 points for the Grizzlies.
Kevin Durant led the Suns with 29 points, 10 rebounds, and 6 assists.
Bradley Beal left the game after the first quarter due to a hip contusion.
The Grizzlies held a 14-point halftime advantage.
Phoenix closed within a point in the fourth quarter.
Bane and Jackson each drained a three to push the lead to 102-97 with 5:55 left.
Booker’s trey made it a 108-106 game with 1:51 to go, but the Grizzlies scored the next six points to essentially close it out.
